about_the_game:
Take your Career to the Marion County Fairgrounds with Knoxville Raceway! This 1/2 mile, semi-banked oval is home to some of the biggest racing events of the year! Download now to race at one of the most famous dirt tracks in the world!

Once installed, Knoxville Raceway will be available in ALL series and ALL modes of play for Tony Stewart's All-American Racing, including Career Mode and Online Multiplayer.


* Add Knoxville Raceway to Tony Stewart's All-American Racing.

* This track is available in all game modes, including Career Mode and Online Multiplayer.

* Every series can race at this track.
detailed_description:
Take your Career to the Marion County Fairgrounds with Knoxville Raceway! This 1/2 mile, semi-banked oval is home to some of the biggest racing events of the year! Download now to race at one of the most famous dirt tracks in the world!

Once installed, Knoxville Raceway will be available in ALL series and ALL modes of play for Tony Stewart's All-American Racing, including Career Mode and Online Multiplayer.


* Add Knoxville Raceway to Tony Stewart's All-American Racing.

* This track is available in all game modes, including Career Mode and Online Multiplayer.

* Every series can race at this track.

package_groups.title: Buy Tony Stewart's All-American Racing: Knoxville Raceway

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit versions of Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260X (Requires at least 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcards
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit version of Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 9600k or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660Ti or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supports DirectInput and XInput steering wheels and controllers

short_description: Head to Iowa and take on Knoxville Raceway!
